title: Sankore Madrasa Timbuktu image circa 1300 Q3

content.question: Which of the following developments contributed most directly to the construction of the structure shown in the image?

choices.label: Population growth made possible by new crops from the Americas
Conquests by Turkic peoples in Afro-Eurasia
Trade in gold and salt across trans-Saharan trade routes
The spread of technological innovations following the Crusades

content.answer: Trade in gold and salt across trans-Saharan trade routes

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
